# Introduction

This is a time series analysis and forecasting exercise, with thousands of potential series to forecast
This was written whilst going through Rob J Hyndman & George Athanasopoulos' excellent online book: [Forecasting: Principles and Practice (3rd ed)](https://otexts.com/fpp3/).
